## Requirements

The following software is required for the complete workflow (from git clone to the running Docker Container).
The specified versions are the tested ones.

* JDK 17+
* Git 2.25.1+
* Apache Maven 3.6.3+
* Docker 20.10.12+
* Docker-compose 1.29.2+

<a href="https://dsp-mail-rest-app-openapi.herokuapp.com/">Demo API</a>

Run demo [Apache James](https://james.apache.org/)
```bash
docker run --network host -d -p "25:25" -p "143:143" -p "127.0.0.1:8000:8000" -v $(pwd)/apache-james/webadmin.properties:/root/conf/webadmin.properties --name james-demo apache/james:demo-3.7.0
```
